name: Garmin Fenix 6S - Unisex
description: The newest entry into the do-everything Fenix line blends smartwatch function with advanced training tools and a backcountry GPS. The S-series use a smaller case that is more comfortable on slim wrists. The Fenix 6 has a bigger screen and a more efficient GPS than before. The latest generation Elevate heart rate monitor, takes your pulse off your wrist. Heart rate data is used for everything from advanced fitness metrics to daily calorie consumption. When you need more info, or a little motivation, the free Connect app pairs your phone to your watch. Connect lets you download training plans, review activities, receive texts, social media alerts and emails, keep an eye on the weather and more. Day-to-day activity tracking and sleep monitoring make the Fenix 6 useful every day, not just on training days.Built-in modes for biking, running, swimming (indoor and out), multisport, gym (strength training, cardio and elliptical, stair stepping, rowing and yoga), golfing (41,000+ course maps), skiing (2000+ ski resort maps) and more.S-series’ smaller case is not only more comfortable on smaller wrists, it also improves optical heart rate signal.Trendline™ routing uses Garmin user’s route data to find the most popular route.ClimbPro™ (preloaded courses only) lets you know the grade, the total ascent and current position on a colour coded elevation profile, so you can pace yourself.PacePro™ (available on preloaded courses only) sets a desired pace, breaks your distance splits, and calculates needed pace for your goal.Body Battery™ tracks daily energy levels, monitoring what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food), letting you train smarter.Garmin Pay™, make payments with your watch (if supported by your bank).Strava Segment integration, preloaded and on-the-fly (through your phone), lets you know when starred segments begin and shows instantaneous data, comparing it to your PR and the current KOM or QOM, and provides results once complete. (requires Strava premium)LiveTrack, share your location and fitness data during activities (through a phone).Connects to 3 satellite constellations (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) and caches satellite positions.Elevate™ V3 optical heart rate monitor has a red LED for Pulse Ox data and even works while swimming.Physiological data: VO2 max, a race predictor, recovery advisor and performance indicator – many take temperature and altitude into consideration.Training load uses data from your past 7-days of workouts to let you know if you are overtraining, under-training, or on the right path.Compatible with running dynamics sensors (sold separately).Incident detection uses internal sensors to detect accidents. In the case of an accident a message and your location will be sent through your paired phone to your emergency contacts.If you feel unsafe, assistance mode sends out a LiveTrack link letting your contacts know where you are.24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle.On board sleep tracking, shows total sleep hours as well as movement and restful sleep.Free Garmin Connect app lets you review activities, receive texts, social media alerts, emails; download training plans, track the weather and more – via Bluetooth to your phone.Connect IQ allows you to download apps, widgets, templates, data fields and more.UltraTrac™ mode reduces the GPS communication to save battery.Pre-set and custom power profiles let you maximize your battery’s power.Tough, non-reflective Gorilla Glass© crystal.ABC data comes in via the internal altimeter, barometer and a tilt-compensated compass.In the box: fēnix 6, charging cable and documentation.
